articles.description: Ketanji Brown Jackson was confirmed to the Supreme Court Thursday afternoon – the first Black woman to ever serve on America’s highest court
articles.content:
Ketanji Brown Jackson was confirmed as the 116th Supreme Court justice Thursday afternoon by the Senate — the first Black woman to ever serve on America’s highest court.
